title: Pretty-Print Number of Bytes
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of pretty-printing numbers in bytes to a human-readable format using JavaScript. We will learn how to convert a given number of bytes into KB, MB, GB, TB, PB, EB, ZB, and YB by using an array dictionary of units. with the help of the Number.prototype.toPrecision() method, we will truncate the number to a certain number of digits and build a prettified string to display the result.

meta.title: Convert Bytes to Human-Readable String
meta.description: Learn how to convert a number in bytes to a human-readable format using JavaScript.
